newsitem.title: USA: FOB Gulf Grain - Basis offers mostly unchanged.
newsitem.headline: FOB Gulf Grain - Basis offers mostly unchanged.

text.p: U.S. FOB Gulf corn, soybean and wheat basis values were mostly unchanged Thursday in very quiet trade, U.S. exporters said.
"Most of the wheat for export is going by rail to the CIF market," said a wheat dealer. "The FOB market is really quiet."
On Thursday in U.S. wheat export markets, Algeria bought up to 275,000 tonnes of wheat, with about half of that quantity expected to be U.S., traders said.
Tunisia has tendered for 150,000 tonnes of U.S. wheat, and one dealer said Morocco was "nosing around for wheat."
CORN (No. 3 yellow, FOB, U.S. Gulf, basis CBOT, cts/bu) -
-- Bid Chng Offer Chng
July unq nc +19 + N unc
FH August unq nc +33 + U unc
LH August unq nc +32 + U unc
FH Sept unq nc +31 + U unc
LH Sept unq nc +30 + U unc
Note: N=CBOT July, U=CBOT Sept, nc=no comparison.
SOYBEANS (No. 2 yellow, FOB, U.S. Gulf, basis CBOT, cts/bu)
-- Bid Chng Offer Chng
June unq nc +85 + Q unc
July unq nc +85 + Q unc
August unq nc +85 + Q unc
FH Oct unq nc +72 + X nc
LH Oct unq nc +47 + X nc
Note: Q=CBOT August, X=CBOT November, nc=no comparison
SRW WHEAT (FOB, U.S. Gulf, basis CBOT, cts/bu) -
-- Bid Chng Offer Chng
July unq nc +13 + N unc
August unq nc +13 + U unc
September unq nc +17 + U dn 3
HRW WHEAT (FOB, U.S. Gulf, basis KCBT, cts/bu) -
LH June unq nc +37 + N unc
July unq nc +37 + N unc
August unq nc +37 + U unc
September unq nc +39 + U unc
Note: N=July futures, U=September futures.
((Chicago newsdesk 312-408-8720))
